replies.author: 哈鱼
replies.txt_content:
打开https://minecraft.net/community然后拉到Forums and Communities
这是被mojang认可的minecraft网站：
Minebook – The Minecraft social network
Minecraft Community on Steam
Minecraft on Reddit
CraftHub
World of Minecraft
Minecraft on Mod DB
Minecrafting.ru – A Russian forum
Minecraft forum – A Spanish forum
Minecraft.fr – A French Minecraft site, potato cubes!
Minecraftfr.com – Another French Minecraft community.
Minecraft-France – French Minecraft community.
Nederlands Minecraft forum – Dutch Minecraft community.
mcbbs.net – One of the biggest Chinese Minecraft communities.
minecraft-hk.com – Hong Kong Minecraft community and forums.
mc官网里有，如果你英语看不懂，推荐你用百度浏览器，官网里有什么国家最大的MC论坛，求满意
